sub_title: MBA candidate, Rotterdam School of Management
summary:
A current full-time MBA student with over 12 years working experience in marketing. Always try to innovate from customer-first angle with business-driven mindset through the think-out-of-box story-telling way.


User Growth | Product Marketing | User Lifecycle Design | Talent Development | Go to Marketing Strategy | Marketing Strategy | Partnership | Customer Engagement | Marketing Insights | Marketing Communication | Content Creation

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

profile_positions.description:
Space Cycle is the leading boutique fitness lifestyle company in Asia.

User Growth
·Restructured the omni-channels of user acquisition, resulting in 5% cost saving and 30% user growth in 2021.
Digital Product Development
· As core member of digital product development team, lead the consumer insight research to identify the product proposition, fix the product pricing, and prepare the GTM strategy accordingly.
· In charge of the PMF of digital product in 2021，including user recruitment, user operation, online content production, user feedback and behavior analysis, product iteration.
Partnership
· Designed the dynamic partnership model to identify the best-fit partner and maximize the commercial return that generated 35% increasing in revenues.
· Established the strategic partnership with RED (equivalent Instagram) for content co- creation and talent nurturing, which became the best practice in the fitness category.
Talent Development
· Set up the Space instructors’ talent development system: from persona customized, social media content creation to commercial return plan, resulting in an influencer matrix with 10 instructors with 0.5 million commercial return to company.
Content Creation
· Increased income of IP program by 65% in 2021 by one iconic IP program content upgrading and one new IP program launching. · In charge of the celebrity and KOL relation maintenance. Set up the on-equity KOL/ influencer pool to help brand win the social buzz, generating over 30% social buzz increase yearly.

GTM Strategy

Marketing & Sales

· In charge of the product packaging upgrading to uplift consumers’ satisfaction and better identify brand in China market.
